}}'''Diari dalla Terza Era''' (Italian: '''Third Age Journals''') is a [[:Category:Fan films|fan film]] that was made released in July 2013. The film can be downloaded online for free.<!--The soundtracks are still up on their youtube channel however the film itself seems to have been privated, another link if possible should be found.-->
==Synopsis==
{{Expansion}}
Diari dalla Terza Era takes place between the events of [[The Lord of the Rings]] and [[The Silmarillion]] specifically in {{TA|1975}} during the fall of Kingdom of [[Angmar]].

The film follows a [[Men|Man]] known as "Il Campione" (Italian:The Champion) who pursues the [[Witch-King|Witch-King of Angmar]] despite [[Glorfindel]]'s prophecy which states:
{{Blockquote|He will not return to this land.  Far off yet is his doom, and not by the hand of man will he fall.|Glorfindel, ''[[The Return of the King]]'', [[Appendix A]] (iv)}}
==Production==
Diari dalla Terza Era is based on [[The Lord of the Rings]] and [[The Silmarillion]], specifically the chapter [[Of the Rings of Power and the Third Age]]. It was an independent, non-profit production shot in April and May 2013 with a budget of 1,400 euros.<ref>{{webcite|author=Robert Arduini|articleurl=https://www.jrrtolkien.it/fandom/cinema/film-diari-dalla-terza-era/|articlename=Film: Diari dalla Terza Era|dated=24 July 2013|website=[https://www.jrrtolkien.it/ jrrtolkien.it]|accessed=29 January 2024}}</ref> Filming took place in The Castle of Piandimeleto, Monte Catria, Monte Acuto, Parco di Cesane in Urbino and Gola del Furlo.<ref>{{webcite|author=Aragorn II|articleurl=https://elanillounico.com/noticias/peliculas/diari-dalla-terza-era-fanfilm-italiano-inspirado-en-el-senor-de-los-anillos/|articlename=Diari dalla Terza Era, fanfilm italiano inspirado en El Se√±or de los Anillos|dated=13 November|website=[https://elanillounico.com/ elanillounico.com]|accessed=29 January 2024}}</ref>
